**Example**

```esql
TS k8s
| WHERE pod == "three"
| STATS max_deriv = max(deriv(network.cost)) BY time_bucket = bucket(@timestamp,5minute), pod
```

| --- | --- | --- |
| 9.3E-5 | 2024-05-10T00:00:00.000Z | three |
| 3.8E-5 | 2024-05-10T00:05:00.000Z | three |
| -2.0E-5 | 2024-05-10T00:10:00.000Z | three |
